text: Does anyone have experience implmenting recaptcha v3?
or is it even possible without a php backend?

Well you need to be able to verify it on the backend, but that doesn't need to be php.  V3 works exactly the same as V2 on the backend.  We used it on a small project within a HS site, however the project got scrapped... best I can tell it was working properly, but I can tell you after that experience we went back to V2 for most use cases.
For most use cases (ie submitting forms), I think V2 is a better product... if you're looking to get more granular and put more time into monitoring bot traffic, then go V3.
